paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant c.1813dupA, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: 30-year-old Caucasian female, her father, and her brother
patients.phenotype: increased risk for developing hereditary breast and ovarian cancer syndrome

individual_records.evidence_sentence: the left breast had hidden ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS), solid type intermediate grade with comedo necrosis with calcifications
her father and brother were found to be positive for BRCA2
her father and brother were found to be positive for BRCA2

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with an increased risk of breast and ovarian cancer.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The patient underwent prophylactic mastectomy due to her BRCA2 status.
key_quotes: the patient tested positive for a BRCA2 mutation c.1813dupA (p.11e605Asnfs*11)
the left breast had hidden ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS)

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the BRCA2 variant was successfully extracted.
